world_board: Several banks in major coastal towns are being robbed! The thieves are still on the loose!
note: Os ladrões estão à solta! Hora de tentar completar o achievement 'Goldhunter'

world_board: A sandstorm travels through Darama, leading to isles full of deadly creatures inside a nightmare. Avoid the northernmost coast!
note: Nightmare Isles se encontram ao norte de Darashia, cuidado!

world_board: A sandstorm travels through Darama, leading to isles full of deadly creatures inside a nightmare. Avoid the river near Drefia!
note: Nightmare Isles se encontram nas montanhas de Drefia, cuidado!

world_board: A sandstorm travels through Darama, leading to isles full of deadly creatures inside a nightmare. Avoid the Ankhramun tar pits!
note: Nightmare Isles se encontram nas Tar Pits de Ankrahmun, cuidado!

world_board: Sharpen your sword! The witch Wyda seems to be bored so pay her a visit!
An ice bridge now connects Svargrond to a frosty island, where monsters and a strange frozen creature have been sighted.
note: É hora de tentar domar o Ursagordão! Chyllfroest está acessível

world_board: In case you have some spare tentacle pieces, you can now use Devovorga's very essence to enter a boss lair!
note: Sobrou tentáculos da Devovorga? É a sua chance de matar o boss de novo

world_board: The river south of the outlaw camp is flooding. A small island there should now be reachable safely.
note: Não tem o achievement 'down the drain'? É hora de ir pro sul de Outlaw camp e aproveitar a cheia do rio para acessar a ilhazinha normalmente indisponível

world_board: The volcano on Goroma sends its fiery message into the sky. A lot of creatures are flooding the lands together with its lava.
wiki_link: Não se assuse se parecer ter mais GS que o normal por perto da Bruxa Wyda.  Ela anda entediada e resolveu criar um desafio para os que ousam passar por perto de sua casa
note: Vai a Goroma? Cuidado! Criaturas perigosas frequentam o vulcão

world_board: A fiery fury gate has opened near one of the major cities somewhere in Tibia.
note: A fury gate está aberta perto de uma das grandes cidades Tibianas

world_board: Hail to the King! It's Kingsday in Thais, join the celebration!
note: Kingsday em Thais, não perca a comemoração!

world_board: Looks like the Queen's own royal trees are being cut down! The lumberjacks responsible shall be put to justice.
note: Lenhadores mal intencionados estão cortando as árvores Reais! Ajude a Rainha a trazer a justiça

world_board: Nomads travel the eternal sands of Ankrahmun's desert. There must be a camp somewhere.
note: Nomads atravessam as areias do deserto de Ankrahmun. Deve haver um acampamento algures

world_board: Not again! Noodles has taken some royal freedom and left the castle, after him in the name of the king!
wiki_link: De novo, Noodles? O cão fujão do Rei foi em uma aventura Tibiana. Ajude a levá-lo para o conforto do castelo

world_board: Oriental ships sighted! A trader for exotic creature products may currently be visiting Carlin, Ankrahmun or Liberty Bay.
note: Ele voltou! Yasir online em **

world_board: The wild animals north of the Green Claw Swamp clearly dominate the area. But poachers come here to hunt them.
note: Hoje é dia de Bears, wolves e war wolves na Poacher's cave. Complete seu bestiário!

world_board: Poachers are ravaging the wildlife north of the Green Claw Swamp. But the animals seem to fight back!
note: Hoje é dia de Poachers e Hunters na Poacher's cave. Complete seu bestiário!

world_board: Poachers have slaughtered nearly all wild animals north of the Green Claw Swamp. But vengeful spirits show up there now!
note: Hoje é dia de Gloom Wolves e Ghost Wolves na Poacher's cave. Complete seu bestiário e garanta aquele profitanas

world_board: The river in Zao Steppe runs deep, there may be more fish than usual!
note: O Rio de Zao está cheio, hora de garantir os Sandfish!

world_board: A whole nest of spiders needs to be exterminated as Mamma Longlegs is on the loose.
note: Muito cuidado com o caminho até Venore, Mamma Longlegs está à solta!

world_board: Adventurers have told of a Spirit Gate in the Daramian mountains. Fight the restless undead!
note: A Spirit Gate se encontra nas montanhas de Darama. Cuidado com os mortos vivos!

world_board: Adventurers have told of a Spirit Gate in the Ghostlands. Fight the restless undead!
note: A Spirit Gate se encontra em Ghostlands. Cuidado com os mortos vivos!

world_board: Adventurers have told of a Spirit Gate in Vengoth. Fight the restless undead!
note: A Spirit Gate se encontra em Vengoth. Cuidado com os mortos vivos!

world_board: Stampede! The Ape God has stirred up Tiquanda's elephants again!
note: Os Deuses Macacos agitaram os elefantes. Hoje é dia de farmar tusk!

world_board: Judging by the unnerved mammoths in Svargrond, enough snow has melted away to reveal some very special flora.
note: O aquecimento global chegou a Svargrond. Mas pelo menos dá pra catar umas florzinhas

world_board: Bibby Bloodbath and her crew are roaming the lands, destroying everything in their path.
note: Bibby Bloodbath e seus amigos Orcs estão à solta. Cuidado para não cair em seu acampamento

world_board: The full moon has a strange impact on the island of Grimvale. The small forest there seems darker, filled with nightly howls.
note: A lua cheia chegou, hora de farmar moonlight crystals. Mas cuidado para não virar Lobisomem e ficar preso em Grimvale

world_board: A big iceberg has been washed up at the coast north of Port Hope. It seems to be inhabited by strange white furballs.
note: Graças ao aquecimento global, um iceberg apareceu ao norte de Port Hope. Mate os chakoyas e garanta seus Northern Pikes

world_board: Strange sounds echo through Trapwood as hunters and dworcs fight over the holy grounds and the game that roams there.
note: A guerra entre Hunters e Dworcs continua em Trapwood.

world_board: A hive infestation has been sighted south-west of Liberty Bay! An unnerving humming and buzzing is filling the air.
note: Se você tem medo de insetos, passe longe do sudoeste de Liberty Bay! Há muitos zumbidos e criaturas assustadoras pelo ar
